price: Deε ͻrehyε mo (sε monyε) ne bͻne, ne (sɛ mobebu) ahohwi bra, ne sε mobεka (nsεm) a monnim ato Nyankopͻn soͻ.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَأَن تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innamā yamurukum bil-sūi wal-faḥshāi wa-an taqūlū ʿalā al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
